extraction.sentences: In 2000, she co-founded the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, the world's largest private charitable organization.

Early life

Melinda Ann French was born on August 15, 1964 in Dallas, Texas.

In 2007, Gates received an honorary doctorate in medicine from the Karolinska Institute in Stockholm, Sweden.
